summary: Completed comprehensive testing of French school management application (Gestion Scolaire). Backend API testing: 25/25 tests passed. Frontend testing: All major workflows completed successfully including class management, student management, composition creation, grade entry, report generation, statistics display, and multi-composition tracking.

validation_issues.issue: Returns 422 when numeric fields contain empty strings instead of numbers
validation_issues.impact: Frontend must handle empty form fields properly before submission
validation_issues.workaround: Frontend already handles this gracefully with proper validation

accessibility_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent components
accessibility_issues.impact: Accessibility warning but does not affect functionality

passed_tests: Class CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Student CRUD operations with class association
Composition CRUD operations with class association
Grade entry with automatic calculations (total, average, ranking, observations)
Statistics generation (effectif, présents, absents, admis, % réussite)
Frontend student management with form validation
Frontend grade entry with subject-specific maximums
Frontend report generation with proper formatting
Grade calculation accuracy (Étude/50, AEM/50, Dictée/20, Math/50, Total/170, Moyenne/10)
Observation assignment based on average (A≥8.5, B≥7, C≥5, D<5)
Ranking calculation by descending total score

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All major workflows working, minor accessibility warnings)
